title: Is It Too Late To Save The Union? (with Anthony Browne MP)
itunes:title: Is It Too Late To Save The Union? (with Anthony Browne MP)
description:
Boris Johnson heads to Scotland for the first time since winning the 2019 election, as polls suggest growing support for independence. But is it too little, too late?

Anthony Browne, Conservative MP for South Cambridgeshire, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek why there shouldn't be another referendum, even if the SNP wins a majority in next year's Holyrood election.

Plus, how easy is it to hack a U.K. election? Darren Hughes, chief executive of the Electoral Reform Society, explains why it's not just the voting method we should be worried about.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
